law.catch_line: Deputy heads of departments and directors of divisions and institutions.
law.text: Unless otherwise provided by law, deputy heads of departments, and directors of divisions and institutions shall be appointed by the heads of the departments and in statutory departments the appointment of deputy heads of departments, and heads of divisions shall be with the prior written approval of the Governor. In departments each division head shall report to the head of the department to which the division is assigned.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. I, sec. 13. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29. -- Repealed in part 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 228, sec. 1(2). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4618-154, 4618-155.
